about_the_game:
All our readers note the high quality of the novel’s music score. It’s hard to leave behind the beloved ambience of One Day in London, which is why we’ve decided to surprise you. This bundle includes a set of beautifully drawn wallpapers for your desktop, as well as the soundtrack to the second episode of the novel!
London will stay with you…

Tracklist:
1. Amber Ringing
2. Bad Decision
3. Blood tears
4. Circus Inferno
5. Feeling good
6. I have a bad feeling about this
7. I'm so sorry...
8. It's Just You And Me Now
9. It's party time!
10. Look at me
11. One Day in London
12. Spider Steps
13. We need to talk
14. Will of the Demon
15. Bonus track - Force of Rebellion

name: One Day in London - Soundtrack & wallpapers: pack 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 1.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compliant
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: 1.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compliant

short_description: Old London’s ambience – the game’s soundtrack and atmospheric wallpapers for your desktop.
